note.p: Son of Walter B. Foster, retired dried goods merchant in Greig, New York (post office Glensdale), and his wife Francis (sic). Clerk in a store, Greig, 1870. Physician and census enumerator, 1875. Physician in Paradise, Kansas, 1880. Farmer in Shenandoah, Colorado, 1910.
New York State Census 1875 (Greig, Lewis [1]/16) (Ancestry.com, accessed 4 June 2020)
United States Federal Census 1870 (Greig, Lewis, New York State [1]/11), 1880 (Paradise, Russell, Kansas [1]/5), 1910 (Shenandoah, Montrose, Colorado [1]/7B) (Ancestry.com, accessed 4 June 2020)
U.S., Find a grave index, 1600s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 4 June 2020)
